content:
The way forward looks dangerous. The surrounding chamber must have suffered from a cave-in at some point in the distant past, and your only way across the open space before you is a narrow walkway of twisted arcology wreckage. When you put your weight on it, you can feel it creak and shift. You’ll need to proceed with caution; one wrong step may cause it to collapse.

Clear the Precarious Wreckage with   while each Ranger’s   is on it to discover the safest route across.
